meanings.definition: To be superior to or surpass in some respect.
meanings.sent1: In the race, the cheetah outmatches the turtle with its speed.
meanings.sent2: The champion boxer always outmatches his opponents in the ring.
meanings.sent3: The little ant thought it could outmatches the elephant in a strength contest!
meanings.sent4: Her determination outmatches any obstacle in her path.
meanings.sent5: The sun outmatches all other stars in brightness.

meanings.definition: To defeat or overcome in a competition or contest.
meanings.sent1: The soccer team outmatches their rivals with their skillful plays.
meanings.sent2: The underdog managed to outmatches the reigning champion in a surprising victory.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel outmatches the birds in a nut-gathering competition.
meanings.sent4: His wit outmatches any opponent in a battle of words.
meanings.sent5: The superhero outmatches the villain with his incredible powers.
